definition: to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries

sentences.english: YuPian is very important on literal-studying and critical interpretation of ancient texts in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 《玉篇》在我國文字學和訓詁學史上至關重要。

sentences.english: Vocabulary is not the only problem in Buddhist sutra exegesis.
sentences.chinese: 佛經文獻訓詁中並不僅有詞義訓釋的問題。

sentences.english: In this thesis, we mainly talk about the problem of Hermeneutic in Literati's Note of Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要討論宋代筆記中所記載的訓詁學問題。

sentences.english: Analyzing the sentence is one of the important parts of the Chinese exegetics .
sentences.chinese: 訓詁學對句子的解釋也是以意義爲中心的。

sentences.english: Chapter Three:analyze the feature of Zheng Xuan's gloss in Guwen Shangshu Zhu by examples.
sentences.chinese: 第三章翠例分析了鄭氏《古文尚害注》的訓詁特點。

definition: variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition

Six Classics, namely: Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], Book of History 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], Book of Rites 儀禮|仪礼[Yi2 li3], the lost Book of Music 樂經|乐经[Yue4 jing1], Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1]
to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
to read and re-read sth until one is familiar with it
